alert.M36.div:
Summary missing.
For example:
Dataset has large scale (1:1.000) topography over Flanders.

alert.M38.div:
Dataset(serie) identificator missing
mandatory to datasets and dataset(series).
For example: 527c4cac-070c-4bca-9aaf-92bece7be902

alert.M39.div:
INSPIRE - ISO category (IsoTopicCategory) is mandatory.
The categories defined in annex D 2 of the INSPIRE implementation rules for metadata are derived from categories of section B.5.27 of ISO 19115.

alert.M40.div:
INSPIRE theme is mandatory
This should be provided as keyword from the GEMET INSPIRE data themes thesaurus.

ul.li: Mandatory for datasets and dataset series.
Conditional for services - only mandatory for services with an explicit spatial boundary.
The descriptive rectangle should be taken as small as possible.
If the descriptive rectangle exceeds the date line, the value of the most western longitude (minimum X) should be bigger than these of the most eastern longitude (maximum X).
The coordinates of the descriptive rectangle should be expressed in a geographic coordinate system which has Greenwich as the Prime Meridian.

alert.M41.N.div: Maximum latitude (Y) missing or wrong value.

alert.M41.S.div: Minimum latitude (Y) missing or wrong value.

alert.M41.E.div: Maximum longitude (X) missing or wrong value.

alert.M41.W.div: Minimum longitude (X) missing or wrong value.

alert.M42.div:
INSPIRE - Temporal reference is mandatory No temporal reference found. Instructions
Define a time period for the dataset/datasetserie or give a reference date for the dataset/datasetserie. This reference date can be either a date of publication, last modification or creation.

alert.M42.creation.div: Only one instance of MD_Metadata.identificationInfo[1].MD_Identification.citation.CI_Citation.date can be defined as date of creation (CI_Date.dateType with creation as value)

alert.M43.div:
INSPIRE - General description of origin is mandatory
Mandatory for datasets and dataset series.
Not applicable for services.
For example:Dataset has been digitized based on a map at scale 1:5.000

div.h2: General description of origin is present.

alert.M44.div:
INSPIRE - Conformity is mandatory (in DQ_DomainConsistency.result.DQ_ConformanceResult)
Instructions
The dataset can be conform/non-conform or the conformity could not be evaluated.

report.M44.nonev.div: The degree of conformity was not evaluated.

report.M44.degree.div: The degree of conformity is specified as:

div.h2: There has to be at least one occurence of: MD_Metadata.identificationInfo[1].MD_Identification.resourceConstraints

alert.M45.ca.div: There has to be at least one occurence of MD_LegalConstraints/accessConstraints or MD_SecurityConstraints/classification.

report.M45.ca.div: There has to be at least one occurence of MD_LegalConstraints/accessConstraints or MD_SecurityConstraints/classification.

alert.M45.or.div: The value of access constraint (accessConstraints) has to be diferent (otherRestrictions), if there are occurences of 'otherConstraints'

alert.M47.div:
INSPIRE - Responsible organization is mandatory.
Both the name of the organization and Email address has to be provided.
See / point of contact.

report.M47.div: Responsible organization for the dataset, dataset serie or service is present.

alert.M47.info.div: The name or Email address of the responsible organization was not defined.

report.M47.info.div: The name and Email address of the responsible organization are present:

alert.M48.role.div: Role of the responsible for the service is not filled.

alert.M48.info.div: Organization name and/or Email not present for the metadata author.

alert.M51.div:
INSPIRE (services) - Linked sources has to be provided if this service operates on datasets.
Instructions:
Not applicable for datasets and dataset series
Conditional for services.

alert.M52.div:
INSPIRE - Connection point URL is mandatory if such a connection point exists.
Sie connection point element under distribution/transfer.
Instructions:
Specify a valid URL to the source. If no direct connection point available, specify an URL to a page with more available information regarding the source.
For a service (Web Service), the connection point can hold one of the the following values:
A link to the capabilities document of the service (GetCapabilities operation);
A link to the WSDL document (SOAP Binding);
A link to the web page with further instructions
A link to an application which makes use of the service.

alert.M53.div:
INSPIRE - Access and use constraints
Access constraints to guarantee the protection of privacy and intellectual property and any restrictions to obtain the source
For example: Intellectual property rights
Security constraints: For example: limited distribution (not for publication)
Use constaints: For example: not applicable for navigation

div.h2: INSPIRE - The value of accessConstraints can only be otherRestrictions if there are occurences of otherConstraints which specify an access constraint.
INSPIRE (datasets and series) - Language dataset(serie) is mandatory if the source contains textual content.
INSPIRE - Spatial resolution is mandatory if an equivalent scale (denominator) or an equivalent resolution (distance) can be defined.

ul.li: Define either a scale or a resolution (distance)
When 2 scales or distances are defined, this has to be seen as an interval.

div.h2: [ISO19119] - Name of the operation is mandatory.

alert.M58.div: Service taxonomy information (keyword from the inspire service taxonomy thesaurus) missing

report.M58.div: classification of the service from the inspire service taxonomy is present.

alert.M60.div:
[ISO19119] - Type of the service has to be specified
Mandatory for services.
Not applicable on dataset and dataset series
For example: 'view', 'discovery', 'download', 'transformation', 'invoke', 'other'
